Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers don't have time to give dedicated feedback/ aren't paid enough to do it. So I don't get much when my assignements are handed back to me. I can ask AI to provide detailed feedback that is often helpful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The AI framed it nicer than the person which is very ironic. Teachers are short on time, so they often are VERY blunt, where as the AI made it a little softer.
